service.name: createFinAccount
service.description: Create a new Financial Account. If no finAccountId is provided, an auto-sequenced one will be used.

service.name: createDepositFinAccountAndDeposit
service.description: Create a new Deposit Account. If no finAccountId is provided, an auto-sequenced one will be used.

service.name: refundDepositContraFinAccTrans
service.description: Refund Deposit Contra Entry for FinAccount Trans

service.name: updateFinAccount
service.description: Update a Financial Account

service.name: updateBankAccount
service.description: Update a New Bank Account

service.name: deleteFinAccount
service.description: Delete a Financial Account

service.name: updateFinAccountBalancesFromTrans
service.description: Update FinAccount.actualBalance and FinAccount.availableBalance based on a new FinAccountTrans; meant to be called as an EECA as it is for data maintenance

service.name: updateFinAccountActualBalanceFromTrans
service.description: Update FinAccount.actualBalance based on a new FinAccountTrans; meant to be called as an EECA as it is for data maintenance

service.name: updateFinAccountAvailableBalanceFromTrans
service.description: Update FinAccount.availableBalance based on a new FinAccountTrans; meant to be called as an EECA as it is for data maintenance

service.name: updateFinAccountBalancesFromAuth
service.description: Update FinAccount.availableBalance based on a new FinAccountAuth; meant to be called as an EECA as it is for data maintenance

service.name: createFinAccountStatus
service.description: Create a FinAccountStatus

service.name: createFinAccountTrans
service.description: Create a new Financial Account Transaction. Will use current timestamp for entryDate and trasanctionDate if none is provided.

service.name: createFinAccountTransIdForInv
service.description: Create a new Financial Account Transaction. Will use current timestamp for entryDate and trasanctionDate if none is provided.

service.name: preCreateFinAccountTrans
service.description: Create a new Financial Account Transaction. Will use current timestamp for entryDate and trasanctionDate if none is provided.

service.name: postFinAccountTransToGl
service.description: Post a Financial Account Transaction to the General Ledger; meant to be called as an SECA

service.name: createFinAcctTransSequence
service.description: Create Fin Account Trans Sequence meant to be called as an SECA

service.name: createFinAccountRole
service.description: Create a new Financial Account Role

service.name: updateFinAccountRole
service.description: Update a Financial Account Role

service.name: deleteFinAccountRole
service.description: Remove a Financial Account Role

service.name: createFinAccountAuth
service.description: Lower level service for creating authorization against a fin account. Will use current time for authorizationDate and thruDate if not supplied.

service.name: expireFinAccountAuth
service.description: Expires a fin account authorization. Will use current time if no time is supplied in parameter

service.name: setFinAccountTransStatus
service.description: Set financial account transaction status

service.name: setMassFinAccountTransStatus
service.description: Set financial bulkaccount transaction status

service.name: populateFinAccountTransSequence
service.description: Populate finAccount Transaction Sequence

service.name: populateFinAccountBalancesFromTrans
service.description: Populate finAccount Transaction Balances

service.name: updateFinAccountBalancesFromTransId
service.description: Update FinAccount Balance From TransId

service.name: createReconsileAndUpdateFinAccountTrans
service.description: Simple finAccntTrans reconsilation Process

service.name: updateFinAccountReconsilationDate
service.description: Update of FinAccountTrans Reconcile Date

service.name: getReqFinAccountTransListAndTotals
service.description: Financial Account Transaction List and Totals

service.name: updatePaymentOnFinAccTransStatusSetToCancel
service.description: Update payment when FinAccountTrans status is set to Cancle, remove finAccountTransId form Payment entity.

service.name: createFinAccountForStore
service.description: Creates a new FinAccount, using defaults from the ProductStoreFinActSetting for expiration date and to generate an automatic account code. Note this would override any user values for from, thru, and acount code

service.name: finAccountDeposit
service.description: Deposit Funds into a Financial Account

service.name: finAccountWithdraw
service.description: Deposit Funds into a Financial Account

service.name: finAccountRefund
service.description: Refunds the deposits to a financial account back to the source

service.name: finAccountReplenish
service.description: Auto-replenish a financial account

service.name: checkFinAccountBalance
service.description: Checks the balance of the financial account

service.name: checkFinAccountStatus
service.description: Checks the status of the financial account; may set statusId to FNACT_MANFROZEN or FNACT_ACTIVE

service.name: getFinAccountTransListAndTotals
service.description: Financial Account Transaction List and Totals

service.name: getFinAccountTransRunningTotalAndBalances
service.description: Financial Account Running Total

service.name: reconcileFinAccountTrans
service.description: Reconcile Financial Accounting Financial Transactions

service.name: reconcileAdjustmentFinAcctgTrans
service.description: Reconcile Financial Accounting Financial Transactions

service.name: reconcileDepositFinAcctgTrans
service.description: Reconcile Financial Accounting Financial Transactions

service.name: reconcileWithdrawalFinAcctgTrans
service.description: Reconcile Financial Accounting Financial Transactions

service.name: getReconciliationClosingBalance
service.description: Service to Get Reconciliation closing balance.

service.name: ofbFaAuthorize
service.description: Authorize a potential transaction against a financial account

service.name: ofbFaCapture
service.description: Capture funds from a pre-authroized financial account transaction

service.name: ofbFaRelease
service.description: Release authorizations back to a financial account.

service.name: ofbFaRefund
service.description: Return funds back to a financial account.

service.name: createGiftCertificate
service.description: Generate a Gift Certificate number/pin and store as a FinAccount

service.name: addFundsToGiftCertificate
service.description: Add funds to a Gift Certificate

service.name: redeemGiftCertificate
service.description: Deduct funds from a Gift Certificate

service.name: checkGiftCertificateBalance
service.description: Obtain the balanace of a Gift Certificate

service.name: createGcFulFillmentRecord
service.description: Creates the fulfillment log

service.name: refundGcPurchase
service.description: Creates return for reload on failure

service.name: ofbGcProcessor
service.description: Process a sale using FinAccount Gift Certificate

service.name: ofbGcAuthorize
service.description: Authorize a potential transaction against a Gift Certificate

service.name: ofbGcRelease
service.description: Release authorizations back to a Gift Certificate. No amount is added back, but an authorization is cancelled.

service.name: ofbGcRefund
service.description: Return funds back to a Gift Certificate. Amounts are added back to the gift certificate.

service.name: ofbGcPurchase
service.description: Automatic CG Purchase Fulfillment Service

service.name: ofbGcReload
service.description: Automatic GC Reload Service

service.name: depositWithdrawPayments
service.description: Deposit withdraw payments

service.name: expirePaymentAssociationsOnFinAccountTransCancel
service.description: expire payment associations with paymentGroup on finAccountTrans cancel

service.name: createPaymentAndFinAccountTrans
service.description: create new payment and associate with respective financial account in FinAccountTrans Entity.

service.name: getTransactionTotalByGlReconcileId
service.description: Transaction Total By GlReconcile Id

service.name: assignGlRecToFinAccTrans
service.description: Assignment of Gl Reconciliation to Fin Account Trans

service.name: removeFinAccountTransFromReconciliation
service.description: Remove finaAccountTrans association with gl reconciliation

service.name: isGlReconciliationReconciled
service.description: Check GlReconciliation is Reconciled or not

service.name: cancelFinancialAccountReconciliation
service.description: Cancel financial account reconciliation.

service.name: cancelFinancialAccountReconciliationNewVbiz
service.description: Cancel financial account reconciliation by Vbiz

service.description: Get associated acctgTransEntries with finAccountTrans

service.description: Auto Reconciled FinAccountTrans entries

service.description: Get Fin Account Bank Names for drop down

service.description: Check For Outgoing/Incoming Fin Account Trans And Create Fin Account Trans Group Member
